name: crypt of the mad king
description:
Handheld (Android) Dungeon crawler where you rely on your melee and magic skills to find loots and solve puzzles as you explore deeper into the forgotten Crypt of a once great king who fell into madness. Legend has it that in his delirium he ordered his wizards to summon something sinister which still lurks in the depths of the crypt...

Are you brave enough to explore the Crypt of the Mad King?!
